translation.en: Sorry.

translation.zh:
-操
-怎么了？

-明天再说吧
-他打了六个电话

睡你妈个睡 赶紧起来
去金屋酒吧和我见面

-回家了

-你会说日语吗？

translation.en: Goldman.

translation.en: Your family must be proud.

translation.en: Well, it's not about them.

translation.en: -How long have you been with us? -Two years.
translation.zh:
-你跟我们工作多久了？
-两年

translation.en: Two whole years.

translation.en: Do you know how many make it to three?

translation.en: "Those who are privy to the inner workings of building a great company
translation.zh:
“那些私底下知道如何内部运作
建立伟大公司的人

translation.en: have long understood that success takes more
translation.zh: 早就明白成功不仅仅

translation.en: than a great idea and a bucket of sweat."
translation.zh: 需要一个好的创意和大量的汗水”

translation.en: "In fact, the most entrepreneurial successes
translation.zh: “实际上最成功的企业

translation.en: are contingent upon learning the rules
translation.zh: 取决于学习规则

translation.en: and navigating within one particular box."

translation.en: I don't know many 17-year-olds published by The Wall Street Journal.

我不知道有多少17岁的人
在《华尔街日报》上发表过文章

translation.en: You're not just navigating the box.

单单上个季度
半数的重要决策都是你做的

translation.en: Well, don't.

translation.en: He wasn't there.

translation.en: What?

translation.en: I, uh, I--I met Campbell.

translation.en: You met Campbell?

translation.en: At two in the morning?

translation.en: Emily.
translation.zh: 艾米丽

translation.en: Did he try anything?

translation.en: No. No, it's not--

translation.en: -If he touched you-- -No, he didn't touch me, Luke.
translation.zh:
-如果他碰过你…
-没有 他没有碰我 卢克

translation.en: Okay. Well then, just tell me what the fuck is going on here.

translation.en: He's promoting me to PM.

translation.en: I'm… I'm taking over for Quinn.

translation.en: Okay.

translation.en: Congratulations.

translation.en: That's amazing.

translation.en: [softly] I'm sorry.

translation.en: Why? Don't… You don't… Come on.

translation.en: I'm so happy for you.

translation.en: Okay?
translation.zh: 好吗？

translation.en: Come here.
translation.zh: 过来

translation.en: I was scared.
translation.zh: 我很害怕

translation.en: [whispering] Emily.
translation.zh: 艾米丽

translation.en: Hey, congratulations.
translation.zh: 嘿 恭喜你

translation.en: I always knew you'd get here.
translation.zh: 我就知道你会成功

translation.en: And if I've ever been tough on you, it's only 'cause I care.
translation.zh:
如果我对你很严厉
只是因为我在意你

translation.en: I appreciate that.
translation.zh: 我很感激

translation.en: All right. Well, I'm always here if you need.
translation.zh: 好的 如果你有需要 我一直都在

translation.en: Thanks, Rory.
translation.zh: 谢谢 洛里

translation.en: [analyst] Makes you wonder how she got the fast pass.
translation.zh:
让你想知道
她是如何进入快速通道的

translation.en: -What do you think? -[analyst] I wouldn't rule it out.
translation.zh:
-你觉得呢？
-我不排除有这种可能

translation.en: Fuck. Well, should I just get a sex change?
translation.zh: 操 我应该去变性吗？

translation.en: [analyst] Yeah, man. I'm just glad I'm not her fucking analyst.
translation.zh:
对 伙计 我很高兴
我他妈不是她的分析员

translation.en: [derisively] Reporting to her? Fuck.
translation.zh: 向她汇报？操

translation.en: -[Arjun] Traded down to 15. -[Campbell] What happened?
translation.zh:
-交易下降到15了
-怎么回事？

translation.en: [Arjun] A PR fuck-up.
translation.zh: 公关搞砸了

translation.en: What makes you think it won't sink to ten?

translation.en: People are getting it wrong.

translation.en: It'll be a little rocky for the next few weeks, but it's not worth trimming.

接下来的几周会有一些波动
但不值得去削减

translation.en: [Paul] DFA keeps going up, against all fucking odds.

尽管有他妈的不利因素
DFA公司一直在上涨

translation.en: Called it.

translation.en: Nobody called it, not even God.

translation.en: Quinn bought it at 26.

translation.en: Fucking Quinn.

translation.en: We should sell now and buy in on YData. The market doesn't understand the stock.

我们应该马上卖出 买进Y数据公司
市场还不理解这只股票

因为执行长存在争议事件

translation.zh:
但它有丰厚的政府合同
并且正在进军商业分析领域

而且交易价格极低

-亨利 告诉我
-涨了3％

我们先从德瑞夫特

在权衡所有三家公司前

知道了 我们应该
在下一小时拿到他们的收入数据

translation.en: [softly] Okay.

translation.en: -Mom. -Finally!

我希望你没有告诉任何人
我们必须小心

translation.en: I don't know. Promise you won't say anything.

好像我的整形外科医生
会告诉你那该死的老板一样

你能帮我个忙

他们刚刚给我升了职
如果他们发现我和我的分析员约…

趴下 我刚喂过你

translation.zh:
-是的
-真是难以置信

-你为什么不告诉我？
-我一直想找机会说

translation.en: Gary, get over here and congratulate your daughter.

translation.en: -[barking] -Stop it!

translation.en: I know, get on the phone.

translation.en: Hi, you've reached Luke. Leave a message.

translation.en: You're low on fuel.

translation.en: Can I buy you another?

translation.en: Now that you're making more money than me?

translation.en: Oh, it's like that.

translation.en: I'm kidding. I'm joking.

translation.en: Come here.

translation.en: Let's celebrate.

translation.en: I'm so fucking proud of you.

translation.en: You know that, right?
translation.zh: 你知道吧？

translation.en: Um, could I get another round and a vodka soda for the lady?

我能再来一轮
再给这位女士倒一杯伏特加汽水吗？

translation.en: How you feeling? You okay? Feeling good?

translation.en: Yeah, you know, I'm still processing it.
translation.zh: 对 你知道 我还在消化中

translation.en: Embrace it. It's really exciting.
translation.zh: 投入进去吧 真的很刺激

translation.en: Cheers.
translation.zh: 干杯

translation.en: Cheers.
translation.zh: 干杯

translation.en: Campbell didn't…?
translation.zh: 坎贝尔没有…

translation.en: He didn't try anything, right?

translation.en: -I would've told you if he did. -I know. I know. I know. I know. I know.
translation.zh:
-如果他做了我会告诉你的
-我知道

translation.en: I know. I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 我知道 对不起

translation.en: -Jesus. -What?
translation.zh:
-天啊
-怎么了？

translation.en: My mom is already planning the fucking wedding.
translation.zh: 我妈已经在策划该死的婚礼了

translation.en: Your parents been harassing you?

translation.en: I haven't told them yet.
translation.zh: 我还没告诉他们

translation.en: Can I get a glass of water? And one for her.

translation.en: You know what? I'm gonna just settle up and get the check, actually.
translation.zh:
你知道吗？
实际上我不喝了 要结账了

translation.en: -Keep the change. -[bartender] Thank you.
translation.zh:
-不用找了
-谢谢

translation.en: I'm gonna help you get the next promotion.

translation.en: I'm okay. Don't worry about me.
translation.zh: 我没事 别担心我

translation.en: I'm serious.
translation.zh: 我是认真的

translation.en: Who knows when the next one's gonna be.
translation.zh: 谁知道下一次会是什么时候

translation.en: I do.
translation.zh: 我知道

translation.en: The way Campbell was talking about Rory,
translation.zh: 坎贝尔讨论洛里的方式

translation.en: it seems like he's on the chopping block.
translation.zh: 听起来他要被解雇了

translation.en: If we play our cards right, I can help you take his spot.
translation.zh:
如果我们把手上的牌打好了
我可以帮你得到他的位置

translation.en: Hey, hey, I appreciate that. I'll make it on my own.
translation.zh: 嘿 我很感激 我自己能搞定

translation.en: I know, but it doesn't mean that I can't help.
translation.zh: 我知道 但不代表我帮不上忙

translation.en: Look, this situation isn't what we expected, but it shouldn't be for long.
translation.zh:
这种情况不是我们预料的
但应该不会太久

translation.en: I really think that we can turn this in our favor
translation.zh:
我真的认为我们可以
让局面变得对我们有利

translation.en: and find a way to move you up at the next opportunity.
translation.zh:
然后在下一次机会中
找到办法让你升职

translation.en: You don't have to, like…
translation.zh: 你不用…

translation.en: I want to. I'll highlight your trade recs to Campbell.
translation.zh:
我想这么做 我会在坎贝尔面前
突出你的交易推荐

translation.en: I'll give you credit where Quinn never has.

translation.en: [Dax] He's a great investor, sure, but he's fucking disorganized
translation.zh:
他是个伟大的投资人
但他真的毫无条理

translation.en: and he's got no time-management skills.
translation.zh: 时间管理技能也特别差

translation.en: I don't know how he survived being an analyst.

我不知道作为分析员
他是怎么活下来的

translation.en: [Emily] How much of the float does management own?

translation.en: And how much are they buying back?

translation.en: Let me dig in. I'll call you later. Bye.

translation.en: Look into this, let me know what you think.

translation.en: I'm still working on the three from before.
translation.zh: 我还在研究之前的那三家公司

translation.en: Okay. Make this one the priority.
translation.zh: 好 优先处理这个

translation.en: [laughs] Okay. Do you still want 'em by the end of the day?
translation.zh:
好吧 在今天结束之前
这三家公司的结果你还要吗？

translation.en: Do you want this or not?

translation.en: You were right to flag it. They could see a pretty decent return next week.
translation.zh:
你把它标出来没错
他们下周会看到不错的回报

translation.en: There's a couple potential bumps from other developers but no red flags.
translation.zh:
其他开发者有一些潜在挑战
但没有危险信号

translation.en: Hey, we're gonna go grab a drink. Do you wanna join?

translation.en: Have you heard of Miro? Sequoia backed.
translation.zh: 你听说过米罗吗？ 红杉资本投了

translation.en: It went public last month. Some say it's an overhyped unicorn
translation.zh:
它上个月上市了
有人说它是被过度炒作的独角兽公司

translation.en: but Luke sourced it, ran the numbers and thinks it can reel in sizable returns.
translation.zh:
但卢克发现了它 进行了测算
认为它可以带来可观的回报

translation.en: -For an overhyped unicorn. -When they announced their plans--
translation.zh:
-对于一家过度炒作的独角兽公司
-当他们公开计划…

translation.en: Do you know how much Luke's last unicorn cost us?
translation.zh:
你知道卢克推荐的上一家
独角兽公司花了我们多少钱？

translation.en: Fifteen million.
translation.zh: 1500万美元

translation.en: [Campbell] Put it under a microscope before you move.
translation.zh: 采取行动之前仔细研究

translation.en: Of course.
translation.zh: 当然了

translation.en: But he's here to support your vision, not steer it.
translation.zh:
但他来是支持你的愿景
不是来掌舵的

translation.en: You coming or not?
translation.zh: 你来不来？

translation.en: -First round's on me. -[Paul] Nice answer.
translation.zh:
-第一轮我请
-不错的答案

translation.en: [Paul] The moron puts in the wrong number of shares.
translation.zh: 那个白痴输错了股票数量

translation.en: It cost him 38 million.
translation.zh: 花了他3800万美元

translation.en: Griffin made the guy write the correct number on the wall
translation.zh:
接下来的六周 每一小时
格里芬让那家伙

translation.en: every hour for the next six weeks.
translation.zh: 把正确的数字写在墙上

translation.en: We didn't finish our conversation earlier.
translation.zh: 我们的谈话还没结束

translation.en: -About? -Luke.
translation.zh:
-什么谈话？
-卢克

translation.en: I'm sure Quinn never told you, but he shorted Brick last month,
translation.zh:
我确定奎恩从没有告诉你
但他上周做了布里克公司的空头交易

translation.en: making up three times for that one loss.
translation.zh: 赚回来那个亏损的三倍

translation.en: He's made great progress analyzing performance.
translation.zh: 他在分析绩效方面进步很大

translation.en: He's sharp, he works hard.
translation.zh: 他很敏锐 他很努力

translation.en: So does my gardener.
translation.zh: 我的园丁也是

translation.en: -He was a favor. -A favor?
translation.zh:
-他是一个恩惠
-恩惠？

translation.en: [Campbell] A friend of mine pushed him on me.
translation.zh: 一个朋友把他介绍给我的

translation.en: It'll just make it easier when he quits on his own.
translation.zh:
他自己辞职的话
事情就变得更容易了

translation.en: Well, he's… he's valuable to me.
translation.zh: 他对我很有价值

translation.en: So is my gardener.
translation.zh: 我的园丁也是

translation.en: He's got good instincts and made us some money, but he's not you.
translation.zh:
他有很好的直觉
帮我们赚了钱 但他不是你

translation.en: He'll get the message.
translation.zh: 他会明白的

translation.en: They all do.
translation.zh: 他们都会

translation.en: Everyone has their own rules guided by their own narrative.
translation.zh:
每个人都有自己的规则
由他们自己的叙述方式所指导

translation.en: You can let other people dictate your narrative
translation.zh: 你可以让别人来决定你的叙述方式

translation.en: or you can choose one that you own.
translation.zh:

-“对不起 我强奸了你”
-对不起 我强奸了你

translation.en: Say, "I'm nothing."
translation.zh: 说“我什么都不是”

translation.en: I'm nothing.
translation.zh: 我什么都不是

translation.en: [whimpering] I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: I'm so sorry, I fucked up.
translation.zh: 真的对不起 我搞砸了

translation.en: I fucked up so bad.
translation.zh: 我完全搞砸了

translation.en: I don't know what happened.
translation.zh: 我不知道发生了什么

translation.en: It wasn't me, I swear.
translation.zh: 我发誓那不是我

translation.en: You know it wasn't me.
translation.zh: 你知道不是我

translation.en: I'll do anything. Tell me what I can do to make it okay.
translation.zh:
我什么都愿意做
告诉我该怎么做才能好起来

translation.en: I'm so sorry.
translation.zh: 真是对不起

translation.en: I will do anything to make it okay for you.
translation.zh: 我愿意做任何事让你好起来

translation.en: [softly] Now, wipe the blood off my floor
translation.zh: 现在把我的地板上的血擦干净

translation.en: and get out.
translation.zh: 然后滚吧

translation.en: I'm done with you now.
translation.zh: 我现在和你一刀两断
